00233 int RangeServer::initialize(PropertiesPtr &props_ptr) {
00234   int error;
00235   bool exists;
00236   String top_dir;
00237 
00241   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->exists("/hypertable/servers", &exists)) != Error::OK) {
00242     HT_ERRORF("Problem checking existence of '/hypertable/servers' Hyperspace directory - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00243     return error;
00244   }
00245 
00246   if (!exists) {
00247     m_hyperspace_ptr->mkdir("/hypertable");
00248     if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->mkdir("/hypertable/servers")) != Error::OK) {
00249       HT_ERRORF("Problem creating directory '/hypertable/servers' - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00250       return error;
00251     }
00252   }
00253 
00254   top_dir = (String)"/hypertable/servers/" + m_location;
00255 
00260   uint32_t lock_status;
00261   uint32_t oflags = OPEN_FLAG_READ | OPEN_FLAG_WRITE | OPEN_FLAG_CREATE | OPEN_FLAG_CREATE | OPEN_FLAG_LOCK;
00262   HandleCallbackPtr null_callback;
00263 
00264   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->open(top_dir.c_str(), oflags, null_callback, &m_existence_file_handle)) != Error::OK) {
00265     HT_ERRORF("Problem creating Hyperspace server existance file '%s' - %s", top_dir.c_str(), Error::get_text(error));
00266     exit(1);
00267   }
00268 
00269   while (true) {
00270 
00271     lock_status = 0;
00272 
00273     if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->try_lock(m_existence_file_handle, LOCK_MODE_EXCLUSIVE, &lock_status, &m_existence_file_sequencer)) != Error::OK) {
00274       HT_ERRORF("Problem obtaining exclusive lock on master Hyperspace file '%s' - %s", top_dir.c_str(), Error::get_text(error));
00275       exit(1);
00276     }
00277 
00278     if (lock_status == LOCK_STATUS_GRANTED)
00279       break;
00280 
00281     cout << "Waiting for exclusive lock on hyperspace:/" << top_dir << " ..." << endl;
00282   }
00283 
00284   Global::log_dir = top_dir + "/log";
00285 
00289   std::string path;
00290   try { 
00291     path = Global::log_dir + "/user";
00292     Global::log_dfs->mkdirs(path);
00293     path = Global::log_dir + "/range_txn";
00294     Global::log_dfs->mkdirs(path);
00295   }
00296   catch (Exception &e) {
00297     HT_ERRORF("Problem creating commit log directory '%s': %s",
00298               path.c_str(), e.what());
00299     return error;
00300   }
00301 
00302   if (Global::verbose)
00303     cout << "log_dir=" << Global::log_dir << endl;
00304 
00305   return Error::OK;
00306 }

00312 void RangeServer::local_recover() {
00313   String meta_log_fname = Global::log_dir + "/range_txn/0.log";
00314   RangeServerMetaLogReaderPtr rsml_reader;
00315   CommitLogReaderPtr root_log_reader_ptr;
00316   CommitLogReaderPtr metadata_log_reader_ptr;
00317   CommitLogReaderPtr user_log_reader_ptr;
00318 
00319   try {
00320 
00324     if ( Global::log_dfs->exists(meta_log_fname) ) {
00325 
00326       // Load range states
00327       rsml_reader = new RangeServerMetaLogReader(Global::log_dfs, meta_log_fname);
00328       const RangeStates &range_states = rsml_reader->load_range_states();
00329 
00333       m_replay_group = RangeServerProtocol::GROUP_METADATA_ROOT;
00334 
00335       // clear the replay map
00336       m_replay_map_ptr->clear();
00337 
00338       foreach(const RangeStateInfo *i, range_states) {
00339         if (i->table.id == 0 && i->range.end_row && !strcmp(i->range.end_row, Key::END_ROOT_ROW)) {
00340           HT_EXPECT(i->transactions.empty(), Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION);
00341           replay_load_range(0, &i->table, &i->range, &i->range_state);
00342         }
00343       }
00344 
00345       if (!m_replay_map_ptr->empty()) {
00346         root_log_reader_ptr = new CommitLogReader(Global::log_dfs, Global::log_dir + "/root");
00347         replay_log(root_log_reader_ptr);
00348         m_live_map_ptr->merge(m_replay_map_ptr);        
00349       }
00350 
00351       // Create root log and wake up anybody waiting for root replay to complete
00352       {
00353         boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00354         if (root_log_reader_ptr)
00355           Global::root_log = new CommitLog(Global::log_dfs, Global::log_dir + "/root", m_props_ptr, root_log_reader_ptr.get());   
00356         m_root_replay_finished = true;
00357         m_root_replay_finished_cond.notify_all();
00358       }
00359 
00363       m_replay_group = RangeServerProtocol::GROUP_METADATA;
00364 
00365       // clear the replay map
00366       m_replay_map_ptr->clear();
00367 
00368       foreach(const RangeStateInfo *i, range_states) {
00369         if (i->table.id == 0 && !(i->range.end_row && !strcmp(i->range.end_row, Key::END_ROOT_ROW)))
00370           replay_load_range(0, &i->table, &i->range, &i->range_state);
00371       }
00372 
00373       if (!m_replay_map_ptr->empty()) {
00374         metadata_log_reader_ptr = new CommitLogReader(Global::log_dfs, Global::log_dir + "/metadata");
00375         replay_log(metadata_log_reader_ptr);
00376         m_live_map_ptr->merge(m_replay_map_ptr);
00377       }
00378 
00379       // Create metadata log and wake up anybody waiting for metadata replay to complete
00380       {
00381         boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00382         if (metadata_log_reader_ptr)
00383           Global::metadata_log = new CommitLog(Global::log_dfs, Global::log_dir + "/metadata", m_props_ptr, metadata_log_reader_ptr.get());
00384         m_metadata_replay_finished = true;
00385         m_metadata_replay_finished_cond.notify_all();
00386       }
00387 
00391       m_replay_group = RangeServerProtocol::GROUP_USER;
00392 
00393       // clear the replay map
00394       m_replay_map_ptr->clear();
00395 
00396       foreach(const RangeStateInfo *i, range_states) {
00397         if (i->table.id != 0)
00398           replay_load_range(0, &i->table, &i->range, &i->range_state);
00399       }
00400 
00401       if (!m_replay_map_ptr->empty()) {
00402         user_log_reader_ptr = new CommitLogReader(Global::log_dfs, Global::log_dir + "/user");
00403         replay_log(user_log_reader_ptr);
00404         m_live_map_ptr->merge(m_replay_map_ptr);
00405       }
00406 
00407 
00408       // Create user log and range txn log and
00409       // wake up anybody waiting for replay to complete
00410       {
00411         boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00412         Global::user_log = new CommitLog(Global::log_dfs, Global::log_dir + "/user", m_props_ptr, user_log_reader_ptr.get());
00413         Global::range_log = new RangeServerMetaLog(Global::log_dfs, meta_log_fname);
00414         m_replay_finished = true;
00415         m_replay_finished_cond.notify_all();
00416       }
00417 
00418     }
00419     else {
00420       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00421 
00426       if (root_log_reader_ptr)
00427         Global::root_log = new CommitLog(Global::log_dfs, Global::log_dir + "/root", m_props_ptr, root_log_reader_ptr.get());
00428 
00429       if (metadata_log_reader_ptr)
00430         Global::metadata_log = new CommitLog(Global::log_dfs, Global::log_dir + "/metadata", m_props_ptr, metadata_log_reader_ptr.get());
00431 
00432       Global::user_log = new CommitLog(Global::log_dfs, Global::log_dir + "/user", m_props_ptr, user_log_reader_ptr.get());
00433 
00434       Global::range_log = new RangeServerMetaLog(Global::log_dfs, meta_log_fname);
00435 
00436       m_root_replay_finished = true;      
00437       m_metadata_replay_finished = true;
00438       m_replay_finished = true;
00439 
00440       m_root_replay_finished_cond.notify_all();
00441       m_metadata_replay_finished_cond.notify_all();
00442       m_replay_finished_cond.notify_all();
00443     }
00444 
00445   }
00446   catch (Exception &e) {
00447     HT_ERRORF("Problem attempting fast recovery - %s - %s", Error::get_text(e.code()), e.what());
00448     _exit(1);
00449   }
00450 }

00453 
00454 void RangeServer::replay_log(CommitLogReaderPtr &log_reader_ptr) {
00455   BlockCompressionHeaderCommitLog header;
00456   uint8_t *base;
00457   size_t len;
00458   TableIdentifier table_id;
00459   DynamicBuffer dbuf;
00460   const uint8_t *ptr, *end;
00461   int64_t timestamp;
00462   TableInfoPtr table_info_ptr;
00463   RangePtr range_ptr;
00464   ByteString key, value;
00465 
00466   while (log_reader_ptr->next((const uint8_t **)&base, &len, &header)) {
00467 
00468     timestamp = header.get_timestamp();
00469 
00470     ptr = base;
00471     end = base + len;
00472 
00473     table_id.decode(&ptr, &len);
00474 
00475     // Fetch table info
00476     if (!m_replay_map_ptr->get(table_id.id, table_info_ptr))
00477       continue;
00478 
00479     dbuf.ensure(table_id.encoded_length() + 12 + len);
00480     dbuf.clear();
00481 
00482     dbuf.ptr += 4;  // skip size
00483     encode_i64(&dbuf.ptr, timestamp);
00484     table_id.encode(&dbuf.ptr);
00485     base = dbuf.ptr;
00486 
00487     while (ptr < end) {
00488 
00489       // extract the key
00490       key.ptr = ptr;
00491       ptr += key.length();
00492       if (ptr > end)
00493         HT_THROW(Error::REQUEST_TRUNCATED, "Problem decoding key");
00494 
00495       // extract the value
00496       value.ptr = ptr;
00497       ptr += value.length();
00498       if (ptr > end)
00499         HT_THROW(Error::REQUEST_TRUNCATED, "Problem decoding value");
00500 
00501       // Look for containing range, add to stop mods if not found
00502       if (!table_info_ptr->find_containing_range(key.str(), range_ptr))
00503         continue;
00504 
00505       // add key/value pair to buffer
00506       memcpy(dbuf.ptr, key.ptr, ptr-key.ptr);
00507       dbuf.ptr += ptr-key.ptr;
00508 
00509     }
00510 
00511     uint32_t block_size = dbuf.ptr - base;
00512     base = dbuf.base;
00513     encode_i32(&base, block_size);
00514 
00515     replay_update(0, dbuf.base, dbuf.fill());
00516   }
00517 }

00520 
00523 void RangeServer::compact(ResponseCallback *cb, TableIdentifier *table, RangeSpec *range, uint8_t compaction_type) {
00524   int error = Error::OK;
00525   String errmsg;
00526   TableInfoPtr table_info;
00527   RangePtr range_ptr;
00528   bool major = false;
00529 
00530   // Check for major compaction
00531   if (compaction_type == 1)
00532     major = true;
00533 
00534   if (Global::verbose) {
00535     cout << *table;
00536     cout << *range;
00537     cout << "Compaction type = " << (major ? "major" : "minor") << endl;
00538   }
00539 
00540   if (!m_replay_finished)
00541     wait_for_recovery_finish();
00542 
00546   if (!m_live_map_ptr->get(table->id, table_info)) {
00547     error = Error::RANGESERVER_RANGE_NOT_FOUND;
00548     errmsg = "No ranges loaded for table '" + (String)table->name + "'";
00549     goto abort;
00550   }
00551 
00555   if (!table_info->get_range(range, range_ptr)) {
00556     error = Error::RANGESERVER_RANGE_NOT_FOUND;
00557     errmsg = (String)table->name + "[" + range->start_row + ".." + range->end_row + "]";
00558     goto abort;
00559   }
00560 
00561   // schedule the compaction
00562   if (!range_ptr->test_and_set_maintenance())
00563     Global::maintenance_queue->add(new MaintenanceTaskCompaction(range_ptr, major));
00564 
00565   if ((error = cb->response_ok()) != Error::OK) {
00566     HT_ERRORF("Problem sending OK response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00567   }
00568 
00569   if (Global::verbose) {
00570     HT_INFOF("Compaction (%s) scheduled for table '%s' end row '%s'",
00571                 (major ? "major" : "minor"), table->name, range->end_row);
00572   }
00573 
00574   error = Error::OK;
00575 
00576  abort:
00577   if (error != Error::OK) {
00578     HT_ERRORF("%s '%s'", Error::get_text(error), errmsg.c_str());
00579     if ((error = cb->error(error, errmsg)) != Error::OK) {
00580       HT_ERRORF("Problem sending error response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00581     }
00582   }
00583 }

00586 
00590 void RangeServer::create_scanner(ResponseCallbackCreateScanner *cb, TableIdentifier *table, RangeSpec *range, ScanSpec *scan_spec) {
00591   int error = Error::OK;
00592   String errmsg;
00593   TableInfoPtr table_info;
00594   RangePtr range_ptr;
00595   CellListScannerPtr scanner_ptr;
00596   bool more = true;
00597   uint32_t id;
00598   Timestamp scan_timestamp;
00599   SchemaPtr schema_ptr;
00600   ScanContextPtr scan_ctx;
00601 
00602   if (Global::verbose) {
00603     cout << "RangeServer::create_scanner" << endl;
00604     cout << *table;
00605     cout << *range;
00606     cout << *scan_spec;
00607   }
00608 
00609   if (!m_replay_finished)
00610     wait_for_recovery_finish(table, range);
00611 
00612   try {
00613     DynamicBuffer rbuf;
00614 
00615     if (scan_spec->row_intervals.size() > 0) {
00616       if (scan_spec->row_intervals.size() > 1)
00617         HT_THROW(Error::RANGESERVER_BAD_SCAN_SPEC, "can only scan one row interval");
00618       if (scan_spec->cell_intervals.size() > 0)
00619         HT_THROW(Error::RANGESERVER_BAD_SCAN_SPEC, "both row and cell intervals defined");
00620     }
00621 
00622     if (scan_spec->cell_intervals.size() > 1)
00623       HT_THROW(Error::RANGESERVER_BAD_SCAN_SPEC, "can only scan one cell interval");
00624 
00625     if (!m_live_map_ptr->get(table->id, table_info))
00626       throw Hypertable::Exception(Error::RANGESERVER_RANGE_NOT_FOUND, (String)"unknown table '" + table->name + "'");
00627 
00628     if (!table_info->get_range(range, range_ptr))
00629       throw Hypertable::Exception(Error::RANGESERVER_RANGE_NOT_FOUND,
00630                                   (String)"(a) " + table->name + "[" + range->start_row + ".." + range->end_row + "]");
00631 
00632     schema_ptr = table_info->get_schema();
00633 
00634     range_ptr->get_scan_timestamp(scan_timestamp);
00635 
00636     scan_ctx = new ScanContext(scan_timestamp.logical, scan_spec, range, schema_ptr);
00637 
00638     scanner_ptr = range_ptr->create_scanner(scan_ctx);
00639 
00640     // TODO: fix this kludge (0 return above means range split)
00641     if (!scanner_ptr)
00642       throw Hypertable::Exception(Error::RANGESERVER_RANGE_NOT_FOUND,
00643                                   (String)"(b) " + table->name + "[" + range->start_row + ".." + range->end_row + "]");
00644 
00645     more = FillScanBlock(scanner_ptr, rbuf);
00646 
00647     id = (more) ? Global::scanner_map.put(scanner_ptr, range_ptr) : 0;
00648 
00649     if (Global::verbose) {
00650       HT_INFOF("Successfully created scanner (id=%d) on table '%s'", id, table->name);
00651     }
00652 
00656     {
00657       short moreflag = more ? 0 : 1;
00658       StaticBuffer ext(rbuf);
00659       if ((error = cb->response(moreflag, id, ext)) != Error::OK) {
00660         HT_ERRORF("Problem sending OK response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00661       }
00662     }
00663   }
00664   catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00665     int error;
00666     HT_ERRORF("%s '%s'", Error::get_text(e.code()), e.what());
00667     if ((error = cb->error(e.code(), e.what())) != Error::OK) {
00668       HT_ERRORF("Problem sending error response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00669     }
00670   }
00671 }
00672 
00673 
00674 void RangeServer::destroy_scanner(ResponseCallback *cb, uint32_t scanner_id) {
00675   HT_INFOF("destroying scanner id=%u", scanner_id);
00676   Global::scanner_map.remove(scanner_id);
00677   cb->response_ok();
00678 }
00679 
00680 
00681 void RangeServer::fetch_scanblock(ResponseCallbackFetchScanblock *cb, uint32_t scanner_id) {
00682   string errmsg;
00683   int error = Error::OK;
00684   CellListScannerPtr scanner_ptr;
00685   RangePtr range_ptr;
00686   bool more = true;
00687   DynamicBuffer rbuf;
00688 
00689   if (Global::verbose) {
00690     cout << "RangeServer::fetch_scanblock" << endl;
00691     cout << "Scanner ID = " << scanner_id << endl;
00692   }
00693 
00694   if (!Global::scanner_map.get(scanner_id, scanner_ptr, range_ptr)) {
00695     error = Error::RANGESERVER_INVALID_SCANNER_ID;
00696     char tbuf[32];
00697     sprintf(tbuf, "%d", scanner_id);
00698     errmsg = (string)tbuf;
00699     goto abort;
00700   }
00701 
00702   more = FillScanBlock(scanner_ptr, rbuf);
00703 
00704   if (!more)
00705     Global::scanner_map.remove(scanner_id);
00706 
00710   {
00711     short moreflag = more ? 0 : 1;
00712     StaticBuffer ext(rbuf);
00713 
00714     if ((error = cb->response(moreflag, scanner_id, ext)) != Error::OK) {
00715       HT_ERRORF("Problem sending OK response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00716     }
00717 
00718     if (Global::verbose) {
00719       HT_INFOF("Successfully fetched %d bytes of scan data", ext.size-4);
00720     }
00721   }
00722 
00723   error = Error::OK;
00724 
00725  abort:
00726   if (error != Error::OK) {
00727     HT_ERRORF("%s '%s'", Error::get_text(error), errmsg.c_str());
00728     if ((error = cb->error(error, errmsg)) != Error::OK) {
00729       HT_ERRORF("Problem sending error response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00730     }
00731   }
00732 }
00733 
00734 
00738 void RangeServer::load_range(ResponseCallback *cb, const TableIdentifier *table, const RangeSpec *range, const char *transfer_log_dir, const RangeState *range_state) {
00739   String errmsg;
00740   int error = Error::OK;
00741   SchemaPtr schema_ptr;
00742   TableInfoPtr table_info_ptr;
00743   RangePtr range_ptr;
00744   string table_dfsdir;
00745   string range_dfsdir;
00746   char md5DigestStr[33];
00747   bool register_table = false;
00748   bool is_root = table->id == 0 && (*range->start_row == 0) && !strcmp(range->end_row, Key::END_ROOT_ROW);
00749   TableScannerPtr scanner_ptr;
00750   TableMutatorPtr mutator_ptr;
00751   KeySpec key;
00752   String metadata_key_str;
00753 
00754   if (Global::verbose)
00755     cout << "load_range " << *table << " " << *range << endl;
00756 
00757   if (!m_replay_finished)
00758     wait_for_recovery_finish();
00759 
00760   try {
00761 
00763     if (!m_live_map_ptr->get(table->id, table_info_ptr)) {
00764       table_info_ptr = new TableInfo(m_master_client_ptr, table, schema_ptr);
00765       register_table = true;
00766     }
00767 
00771     if ((error = verify_schema(table_info_ptr, table->generation, errmsg)) != Error::OK)
00772       HT_THROW(error, errmsg);
00773 
00774     if (register_table)
00775       m_live_map_ptr->set(table->id, table_info_ptr);
00776 
00780     if (table_info_ptr->get_range(range, range_ptr))
00781       HT_THROW(Error::RANGESERVER_RANGE_ALREADY_LOADED, (String)table->name + "[" + range->start_row + ".." + range->end_row + "]");
00782 
00786     if (!Global::metadata_table_ptr) {
00787       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00788       Global::metadata_table_ptr = new Table(m_props_ptr, m_conn_manager_ptr, Global::hyperspace_ptr, "METADATA");
00789     }
00790 
00791     schema_ptr = table_info_ptr->get_schema();
00792 
00798     if (!is_root) {
00799 
00800       metadata_key_str = String("") + (uint32_t)table->id + ":" + range->end_row;
00801 
00805       mutator_ptr = Global::metadata_table_ptr->create_mutator();
00806 
00807       key.row = metadata_key_str.c_str();
00808       key.row_len = strlen(metadata_key_str.c_str());
00809       key.column_family = "Location";
00810       key.column_qualifier = 0;
00811       key.column_qualifier_len = 0;
00812       mutator_ptr->set(0, key, (uint8_t *)m_location.c_str(), strlen(m_location.c_str()));
00813       mutator_ptr->flush();
00814 
00815     }
00816     else {  //root
00817       uint64_t handle;
00818       HandleCallbackPtr null_callback;
00819       uint32_t oflags = OPEN_FLAG_READ | OPEN_FLAG_WRITE | OPEN_FLAG_CREATE;
00820 
00821       HT_INFO("Loading root METADATA range");
00822 
00823       if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->open("/hypertable/root", oflags, null_callback, &handle)) != Error::OK) {
00824         HT_ERRORF("Problem creating Hyperspace root file '/hypertable/root' - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00825         HT_ABORT;
00826       }
00827 
00828       if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_set(handle, "Location", m_location.c_str(), strlen(m_location.c_str()))) != Error::OK) {
00829         HT_ERRORF("Problem creating attribute 'location' on Hyperspace file '/hypertable/root' - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00830         HT_ABORT;
00831       }
00832 
00833       m_hyperspace_ptr->close(handle);
00834     }
00835 
00840     {
00841       assert(*range->end_row != 0);
00842       md5_string(range->end_row, md5DigestStr);
00843       md5DigestStr[24] = 0;
00844       table_dfsdir = (string)"/hypertable/tables/" + (string)table->name;
00845       list<Schema::AccessGroup *> *aglist = schema_ptr->get_access_group_list();
00846       for (list<Schema::AccessGroup *>::iterator ag_it = aglist->begin(); ag_it != aglist->end(); ag_it++) {
00847         // notice the below variables are different "range" vs. "table"
00848         range_dfsdir = table_dfsdir + "/" + (*ag_it)->name + "/" + md5DigestStr;
00849         Global::dfs->mkdirs(range_dfsdir);
00850       }
00851     }
00852 
00853     range_ptr = new Range(m_master_client_ptr, table, schema_ptr, range, range_state);
00854 
00858     if (table->id == 0) {
00859       if (is_root) {
00860         Global::log_dfs->mkdirs(Global::log_dir + "/root");
00861         Global::root_log = new CommitLog(Global::log_dfs, Global::log_dir + "/root", m_props_ptr);
00862       }
00863       else if (Global::metadata_log == 0) {
00864         Global::log_dfs->mkdirs(Global::log_dir + "/metadata");
00865         Global::metadata_log = new CommitLog(Global::log_dfs, Global::log_dir + "/metadata", m_props_ptr);
00866       }
00867     }
00868 
00874     if (transfer_log_dir && *transfer_log_dir) {
00875       int64_t timestamp;
00876       CommitLogReaderPtr commit_log_reader_ptr = new CommitLogReader(Global::dfs, transfer_log_dir);
00877       CommitLog *log;
00878       if (is_root)
00879         log = Global::root_log;
00880       else if (table->id == 0)
00881         log = Global::metadata_log;
00882       else
00883         log = Global::user_log;
00884       
00885       timestamp = Global::user_log->get_timestamp();
00886       range_ptr->replay_transfer_log(commit_log_reader_ptr.get(), timestamp);
00887       if ((error = log->link_log(commit_log_reader_ptr.get(), timestamp)) != Error::OK)
00888         HT_THROW(error, (String)"Unable to link transfer log (" + transfer_log_dir + ") into commit log (" + log->get_log_dir().c_str() + ")");
00889     }
00890 
00891     table_info_ptr->add_range(range_ptr);
00892 
00893     if (Global::range_log)
00894       Global::range_log->log_range_loaded(*table, *range, *range_state);
00895 
00896     if (cb && (error = cb->response_ok()) != Error::OK) {
00897       HT_ERRORF("Problem sending OK response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00898     }
00899     else {
00900       HT_INFOF("Successfully loaded range %s[%s..%s]", table->name, range->start_row, range->end_row);
00901     }
00902 
00903   }
00904   catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00905     HT_ERRORF("%s '%s'", Error::get_text(e.code()), e.what());
00906     if (cb && (error = cb->error(e.code(), e.what())) != Error::OK) {
00907       HT_ERRORF("Problem sending error response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00908     }
00909   }
00910 }
00911 
00912 
00913 namespace {
00914 
00915   struct UpdateRec {
00916     const uint8_t *base;
00917     size_t len;
00918   };
00919 
00920   struct SendBackRec {
00921     int error;
00922     uint32_t offset;
00923     uint32_t len;
00924   };
00925 
00926   struct MinTimestampRec {
00927     RangePtr range_ptr;
00928     Timestamp timestamp;
00929   };
00930 }
00931 
00932 
00933 
00937 void RangeServer::update(ResponseCallbackUpdate *cb, TableIdentifier *table, StaticBuffer &buffer) {
00938   uint8_t *mod_ptr;
00939   const uint8_t *mod_end;
00940   const uint8_t *add_base_ptr;
00941   const uint8_t *add_end_ptr;
00942   uint8_t *ts_ptr;
00943   const uint8_t auto_ts[8] = { 0xff, 0xff, 0xff, 0xff, 0xff, 0xff, 0xff, 0xff };
00944   string errmsg;
00945   int error = Error::OK;
00946   TableInfoPtr table_info_ptr;
00947   int64_t initial_timestamp;
00948   int64_t update_timestamp = 0;
00949   int64_t min_timestamp = 0;
00950   const char *row;
00951   String split_row;
00952   vector<UpdateRec> rootmods;
00953   vector<UpdateRec> gomods;
00954   vector<UpdateRec> splitmods;
00955   UpdateRec update;
00956   CommitLogPtr splitlog;
00957   size_t rootsz = 0;
00958   size_t gosz = 0;
00959   size_t splitsz = 0;
00960   String end_row;
00961   std::vector<MinTimestampRec>  min_ts_vector;
00962   MinTimestampRec  min_ts_rec;
00963   int64_t next_timestamp;
00964   int64_t temp_timestamp;
00965   uint64_t memory_added = 0;
00966   uint64_t items_added = 0;
00967   bool split_pending;
00968   ByteString key, value;
00969   bool a_locked = false;
00970   bool b_locked = false;
00971   vector<SendBackRec> send_back_vector;
00972   const uint8_t *send_back_ptr = 0;
00973   uint32_t misses = 0;
00974 
00975   min_ts_vector.reserve(50);
00976 
00977   if (Global::verbose) {
00978     cout << "RangeServer::update" << endl;
00979     cout << *table;
00980   }
00981 
00982   if (!m_replay_finished)
00983     wait_for_recovery_finish();
00984 
00985   initial_timestamp = Global::user_log->get_timestamp();
00986 
00987   // TODO: Sanity check mod data (checksum validation)
00988 
00989   try {
00990 
00991     // Fetch table info
00992     if (!m_live_map_ptr->get(table->id, table_info_ptr)) {
00993       StaticBuffer ext(new uint8_t [12], 12);
00994       uint8_t *ptr = ext.base;
00995       encode_i32(&ptr, Error::RANGESERVER_TABLE_NOT_FOUND);
00996       encode_i32(&ptr, 0);
00997       encode_i32(&ptr, buffer.size);
00998       HT_ERRORF("Unable to find table info for table '%s'", table->name);
00999       if ((error = cb->response(ext)) != Error::OK)
01000         HT_ERRORF("Problem sending OK response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
01001       return;
01002     }
01003 
01004     // verify schema
01005     if ((error = verify_schema(table_info_ptr, table->generation, errmsg)) != Error::OK) {
01006       HT_ERRORF("%s", errmsg.c_str());
01007       cb->error(error, errmsg);
01008       return;
01009     }
01010 
01011     mod_end = buffer.base + buffer.size;
01012     mod_ptr = buffer.base;
01013 
01014     gomods.clear();
01015 
01016     m_update_mutex_a.lock();
01017     a_locked = true;
01018 
01019     send_back_ptr = 0;
01020 
01021     while (mod_ptr < mod_end) {
01022 
01023       key.ptr = mod_ptr;
01024 
01025       if (*mod_ptr == 0) {
01026         send_back_ptr = mod_ptr;
01027         mod_ptr = (uint8_t *)mod_end;
01028         error = Error::BAD_KEY;
01029         break;
01030       }
01031 
01032       row = key.str();
01033 
01034       // Look for containing range, add to stop mods if not found
01035       if (!table_info_ptr->find_containing_range(row, min_ts_rec.range_ptr)) {
01036         if (send_back_ptr == 0)
01037           send_back_ptr = mod_ptr;
01038         key.next(); // skip key
01039         key.next(); // skip value;
01040         mod_ptr = (uint8_t *)key.ptr;
01041         misses++;
01042         continue;
01043       }
01044 
01045       if (send_back_ptr) {
01046         SendBackRec send_back;
01047         send_back.error = Error::RANGESERVER_OUT_OF_RANGE;
01048         send_back.offset = send_back_ptr - buffer.base;
01049         send_back.len = mod_ptr - send_back_ptr;
01050         send_back_vector.push_back(send_back);
01051         send_back_ptr = 0;
01052       }
01053 
01054       add_base_ptr = mod_ptr;
01055 
01057       min_ts_rec.range_ptr->increment_update_counter();
01058 
01059       // Make sure range didn't just shrink
01060       if (strcmp(row, (min_ts_rec.range_ptr->start_row()).c_str()) <= 0) {
01061         min_ts_rec.range_ptr->decrement_update_counter();
01062         continue;
01063       }
01064 
01066       min_timestamp = min_ts_rec.range_ptr->get_latest_timestamp();
01067 
01069       update_timestamp = Global::user_log->get_timestamp();
01070 
01071       end_row = min_ts_rec.range_ptr->end_row();
01072 
01074       split_pending = min_ts_rec.range_ptr->get_split_info(split_row, splitlog);
01075 
01076       splitmods.clear();
01077       splitsz = 0;
01078 
01079       next_timestamp = 0;
01080       min_ts_rec.timestamp.logical = 0;
01081       min_ts_rec.timestamp.real = update_timestamp;
01082 
01083       while (mod_ptr < mod_end && (end_row == "" || (strcmp(row, end_row.c_str()) <= 0))) {
01084 
01085         // If timestamp value is set to AUTO (zero one's compliment), then assign a timestamp
01086         ts_ptr = mod_ptr + key.length() - 8;
01087         if (!memcmp(ts_ptr, auto_ts, 8)) {
01088           if (next_timestamp == 0)
01089             next_timestamp = update_timestamp;
01090           temp_timestamp = ++next_timestamp;
01091           if (min_ts_rec.timestamp.logical == 0 || temp_timestamp < min_ts_rec.timestamp.logical)
01092             min_ts_rec.timestamp.logical = temp_timestamp;
01093           Key::encode_ts64(&ts_ptr, temp_timestamp);
01094         }
01095         else {
01096           uint8_t flag = *(ts_ptr-1);
01097           temp_timestamp = Key::decode_ts64((const uint8_t **)&ts_ptr);
01098           if (flag > FLAG_DELETE_CELL && temp_timestamp <= min_timestamp) {
01099             error = Error::RANGESERVER_TIMESTAMP_ORDER_ERROR;
01100             errmsg = (string)"Update timestamp " + (long long)temp_timestamp + " is <= previously seen timestamp of " + (long long)min_timestamp;
01101             min_ts_rec.range_ptr->decrement_update_counter();
01102             m_update_mutex_a.unlock();
01103             goto abort;
01104           }
01105           if (min_ts_rec.timestamp.logical == 0 || temp_timestamp < min_ts_rec.timestamp.logical)
01106             min_ts_rec.timestamp.logical = temp_timestamp;
01107         }
01108 
01109         update.base = mod_ptr;
01110         key.next(); // skip key
01111         key.next(); // skip value
01112         mod_ptr = (uint8_t *)key.ptr;
01113         update.len = mod_ptr - update.base;
01114         if (split_pending && strcmp(row, split_row.c_str()) <= 0) {
01115           splitmods.push_back(update);
01116           splitsz += update.len;
01117         }
01118         else if (min_ts_rec.range_ptr->is_root()) {
01119           rootmods.push_back(update);
01120           rootsz += update.len;
01121         }
01122         else {
01123           gomods.push_back(update);
01124           gosz += update.len;
01125         }
01126         if (mod_ptr < mod_end)
01127           row = key.str();
01128       }
01129 
01130       add_end_ptr = mod_ptr;
01131 
01132       // force scans to only see updates before the earliest time in this range
01133       min_ts_rec.timestamp.logical--;
01134       min_ts_rec.range_ptr->add_update_timestamp(min_ts_rec.timestamp);
01135       min_ts_vector.push_back(min_ts_rec);
01136 
01137       if (splitsz > 0) {
01138         DynamicBuffer dbuf(splitsz + table->encoded_length());
01139 
01140         table->encode(&dbuf.ptr);
01141 
01142         items_added += splitmods.size();
01143         memory_added += splitsz;
01144 
01145         for (size_t i=0; i<splitmods.size(); i++) {
01146           memcpy(dbuf.ptr, splitmods[i].base, splitmods[i].len);
01147           dbuf.ptr += splitmods[i].len;
01148         }
01149 
01150         HT_EXPECT(dbuf.fill() <= (splitsz + table->encoded_length()), Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION);
01151 
01152         if ((error = splitlog->write(dbuf, update_timestamp)) != Error::OK) {
01153           errmsg = (string)"Problem writing " + (int)dbuf.fill() + " bytes to split log";
01154           m_update_mutex_a.unlock();
01155           goto abort;
01156         }
01157       }
01158 
01162       min_ts_rec.range_ptr->lock();
01163       {
01164         uint8_t *ptr = (uint8_t *)add_base_ptr;
01165         while (ptr < add_end_ptr) {
01166           key.ptr = ptr;
01167           ptr += key.length();
01168           value.ptr = ptr;
01169           ptr += value.length();
01170           if ((error = min_ts_rec.range_ptr->add(key, value, update_timestamp)) != Error::OK) {
01171             SendBackRec send_back;
01172             send_back.error = error;
01173             send_back.offset = key.ptr - buffer.base;
01174             send_back.len = add_end_ptr - key.ptr;
01175             send_back_vector.push_back(send_back);
01176             break;
01177           }
01178         }
01179       }
01180       min_ts_rec.range_ptr->unlock(update_timestamp);
01181 
01185       if (!min_ts_rec.range_ptr->maintenance_in_progress()) {
01186         std::vector<AccessGroup::CompactionPriorityData> priority_data_vec;
01187         std::vector<AccessGroup *> compactions;
01188         uint64_t disk_usage = 0;
01189 
01190         min_ts_rec.range_ptr->get_compaction_priority_data(priority_data_vec);
01191         for (size_t i=0; i<priority_data_vec.size(); i++) {
01192           disk_usage += priority_data_vec[i].disk_used;
01193           if (!priority_data_vec[i].in_memory && priority_data_vec[i].mem_used >= (uint32_t)Global::access_group_max_mem)
01194             compactions.push_back(priority_data_vec[i].ag);
01195         }
01196 
01197         if (!min_ts_rec.range_ptr->is_root() &&
01198             (disk_usage > min_ts_rec.range_ptr->get_size_limit() ||
01199              (Global::range_metadata_max_bytes && table->id == 0 && disk_usage > Global::range_metadata_max_bytes))) {
01200           if (!min_ts_rec.range_ptr->test_and_set_maintenance())
01201             Global::maintenance_queue->add(new MaintenanceTaskSplit(min_ts_rec.range_ptr));
01202         }
01203         else if (!compactions.empty()) {
01204           if (!min_ts_rec.range_ptr->test_and_set_maintenance()) {
01205             for (size_t i=0; i<compactions.size(); i++)
01206               compactions[i]->set_compaction_bit();
01207             Global::maintenance_queue->add(new MaintenanceTaskCompaction(min_ts_rec.range_ptr, false));
01208           }
01209         }
01210       }
01211 
01212       if (Global::verbose) {
01213         HT_INFOF("Added %d (%d split off) updates to '%s'", gomods.size()+splitmods.size(), splitmods.size(), table->name);
01214       }
01215     }
01216 
01217     if (send_back_ptr) {
01218       SendBackRec send_back;
01219       send_back.error = error ? error : Error::RANGESERVER_OUT_OF_RANGE;
01220       error = Error::OK;
01221       send_back.offset = send_back_ptr - buffer.base;
01222       send_back.len = mod_ptr - send_back_ptr;
01223       send_back_vector.push_back(send_back);
01224       send_back_ptr = 0;
01225     }
01226 
01227     m_update_mutex_b.lock();
01228     m_update_mutex_a.unlock();
01229     b_locked = true;
01230 
01234     if (rootsz > 0) {
01235       DynamicBuffer dbuf(rootsz + table->encoded_length());
01236 
01237       table->encode(&dbuf.ptr);
01238 
01239       items_added += rootmods.size();
01240       memory_added += rootsz;
01241 
01242       for (size_t i=0; i<rootmods.size(); i++) {
01243         memcpy(dbuf.ptr, rootmods[i].base, rootmods[i].len);
01244         dbuf.ptr += rootmods[i].len;
01245       }
01246 
01247       HT_EXPECT(dbuf.fill() <= (rootsz + table->encoded_length()), Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION);
01248 
01249       if ((error = Global::root_log->write(dbuf, initial_timestamp)) != Error::OK) {
01250         errmsg = (string)"Problem writing " + (int)dbuf.fill() + " bytes to ROOT commit log";
01251         m_update_mutex_b.unlock();
01252         goto abort;
01253       }
01254     }
01255 
01259     if (gosz > 0) {
01260       DynamicBuffer dbuf(gosz + table->encoded_length());
01261       CommitLog *log = (table->id == 0) ? Global::metadata_log : Global::user_log;
01262 
01263       table->encode(&dbuf.ptr);
01264 
01265       items_added += gomods.size();
01266       memory_added += gosz;
01267 
01268       for (size_t i=0; i<gomods.size(); i++) {
01269         memcpy(dbuf.ptr, gomods[i].base, gomods[i].len);
01270         dbuf.ptr += gomods[i].len;
01271       }
01272 
01273       HT_EXPECT(dbuf.fill() <= (gosz + table->encoded_length()), Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION);
01274 
01275       if ((error = log->write(dbuf, initial_timestamp)) != Error::OK) {
01276         errmsg = (string)"Problem writing " + (int)dbuf.fill() + " bytes to commit log (" + log->get_log_dir() + ")";
01277         m_update_mutex_b.unlock();
01278         goto abort;
01279       }
01280     }
01281 
01282     m_update_mutex_b.unlock();
01283 
01284     if (Global::verbose && misses) {
01285       HT_INFOF("Sent back %d updates because out-of-range", misses);
01286     }
01287 
01288     error = Error::OK;
01289   }
01290   catch (Exception &e) {
01291     HT_ERRORF("Exception caught: %s", Error::get_text(e.code()));
01292     error = e.code();
01293     errmsg = e.what();
01294     if (b_locked)
01295       m_update_mutex_b.unlock();
01296     else if (a_locked)
01297       m_update_mutex_a.unlock();
01298   }
01299 
01300   m_bytes_loaded += buffer.size;
01301 
01302  abort:
01303 
01304   Global::memory_tracker.add_memory(memory_added);
01305   Global::memory_tracker.add_items(items_added);
01306 
01307   {
01308     uint64_t mt_memory = Global::memory_tracker.get_memory();
01309     uint64_t mt_items = Global::memory_tracker.get_items();
01310     uint64_t vm_estimate = mt_memory + (mt_items*120);
01311     HT_INFOF("drj mem=%lld items=%lld vm-est%lld", mt_memory, mt_items, vm_estimate);
01312   }
01313 
01314   splitlog = 0;
01315 
01316   // unblock scanner timestamp and decrement update counter
01317   for (size_t i=0; i<min_ts_vector.size(); i++) {
01318     min_ts_vector[i].range_ptr->remove_update_timestamp(min_ts_vector[i].timestamp);
01319     min_ts_vector[i].range_ptr->decrement_update_counter();
01320   }
01321 
01322   if (error == Error::OK) {
01326     if (!send_back_vector.empty()) {
01327       StaticBuffer ext(new uint8_t [send_back_vector.size() * 12], send_back_vector.size() * 12);
01328       uint8_t *ptr = ext.base;
01329       for (size_t i=0; i<send_back_vector.size(); i++) {
01330         encode_i32(&ptr, send_back_vector[i].error);
01331         encode_i32(&ptr, send_back_vector[i].offset);
01332         encode_i32(&ptr, send_back_vector[i].len);
01333       }
01334       if ((error = cb->response(ext)) != Error::OK) {
01335         HT_ERRORF("Problem sending OK response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
01336       }
01337     }
01338     else {
01339       if ((error = cb->response_ok()) != Error::OK) {
01340         HT_ERRORF("Problem sending OK response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
01341       }
01342     }
01343   }
01344   else {
01345     HT_ERRORF("%s '%s'", Error::get_text(error), errmsg.c_str());
01346     if ((error = cb->error(error, errmsg)) != Error::OK) {
01347       HT_ERRORF("Problem sending error response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
01348     }
01349   }
01350 }
01351 
01352 
01353 
01354 void RangeServer::drop_table(ResponseCallback *cb, TableIdentifier *table) {
01355   TableInfoPtr table_info_ptr;
01356   std::vector<RangePtr> range_vector;
01357   String metadata_prefix;
01358   String metadata_key; // ***********  = String("") + (uint32_t)m_table_identifier.id + ":" + m_end_row;
01359   TableMutatorPtr mutator_ptr;
01360   KeySpec key;
01361 
01362   if (Global::verbose) {
01363     HT_INFOF("drop_table '%s'", table->name);
01364     cout << flush;
01365   }
01366 
01367   if (!m_replay_finished)
01368     wait_for_recovery_finish();
01369 
01370   // create METADATA table mutator for clearing 'Location' columns
01371   mutator_ptr = Global::metadata_table_ptr->create_mutator();
01372 
01373   // initialize key structure
01374   memset(&key, 0, sizeof(key));
01375   key.column_family = "Location";
01376 
01377   try {
01378 
01379      // For each range in dropped table, Set the 'drop' bit and clear
01380     // the 'Location' column of the corresponding METADATA entry
01381     if (m_live_map_ptr->remove(table->id, table_info_ptr)) {
01382       metadata_prefix = String("") + table_info_ptr->get_id() + ":";
01383       table_info_ptr->get_range_vector(range_vector);
01384       for (size_t i=0; i<range_vector.size(); i++) {
01385         range_vector[i]->drop();
01386         metadata_key = metadata_prefix + range_vector[i]->end_row();
01387         key.row = metadata_key.c_str();
01388         key.row_len = metadata_key.length();
01389         mutator_ptr->set(key, "!", 1);
01390       }
01391       range_vector.clear();
01392     }
01393     else {
01394       HT_ERRORF("drop_table '%s' id=%u - table not found", table->name, table->id);
01395     }
01396     mutator_ptr->flush();
01397   }
01398   catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
01399     HT_ERRORF("Problem clearing 'Location' columns of METADATA - %s", Error::get_text(e.code()));
01400     cb->error(e.code(), "Problem clearing 'Location' columns of METADATA");
01401     return;
01402   }
01403 
01404   // write range transaction entry
01405   if (Global::range_log)
01406     Global::range_log->log_drop_table(*table);
01407 
01408   if (Global::verbose) {
01409     HT_INFOF("Successfully dropped table '%s'", table->name);
01410     cout << flush;
01411   }
01412 
01413   cb->response_ok();
01414 }
01415 
01416 
01417 void RangeServer::dump_stats(ResponseCallback *cb) {
01418   std::vector<TableInfoPtr> table_vec;
01419   std::vector<RangePtr> range_vec;
01420 
01421   HT_INFO("dump_stats");
01422 
01423   m_live_map_ptr->get_all(table_vec);
01424 
01425   for (size_t i=0; i<table_vec.size(); i++) {
01426     range_vec.clear();
01427     table_vec[i]->get_range_vector(range_vec);
01428     for (size_t i=0; i<range_vec.size(); i++)
01429       range_vec[i]->dump_stats();
01430   }
01431   cb->response_ok();
01432 }
01433 
01434 
01438 void RangeServer::replay_begin(ResponseCallback *cb, uint16_t group) {
01439   String replay_log_dir = format("/hypertable/servers/%s/log/replay",
01440                                  m_location.c_str());
01441 
01442   m_replay_group = group;
01443 
01444   if (Global::verbose) {
01445     HT_INFOF("replay_start group=%d", m_replay_group);
01446     cout << flush;
01447   }
01448 
01449   m_replay_log_ptr = 0;
01450 
01451   m_replay_map_ptr->clear_ranges();
01452 
01456   try { Global::log_dfs->rmdir(replay_log_dir); }
01457   catch (Exception &e) {
01458     HT_ERRORF("Problem removing replay log directory: %s", e.what());
01459     cb->error(e.code(), format("Problem removing replay log directory: %s",
01460               e.what()));
01461     return;
01462   }
01463 
01467   try { Global::log_dfs->mkdirs(replay_log_dir); }
01468   catch (Exception &e) {
01469     HT_ERRORF("Problem creating replay log directory: %s ", e.what());
01470     cb->error(e.code(), format("Problem creating replay log directory: %s",
01471               e.what()));
01472     return;
01473   }
01474 
01475   m_replay_log_ptr = new CommitLog(Global::log_dfs, replay_log_dir, m_props_ptr);
01476 
01477   cb->response_ok();
01478 }
01479 
01482 void RangeServer::replay_load_range(ResponseCallback *cb, const TableIdentifier *table, const RangeSpec *range, const RangeState *range_state) {
01483   String errmsg;
01484   int error = Error::OK;
01485   SchemaPtr schema_ptr;
01486   TableInfoPtr table_info_ptr;
01487   RangePtr range_ptr;
01488   string table_dfsdir;
01489   string range_dfsdir;
01490   bool register_table = false;
01491   TableScannerPtr scanner_ptr;
01492   TableMutatorPtr mutator_ptr;
01493   KeySpec key;
01494   String metadata_key_str;
01495 
01496   if (Global::verbose) {
01497     cout << "replay_load_range" << endl;
01498     cout << *table;
01499     cout << *range;
01500     cout << flush;
01501   }
01502 
01503   try {
01504 
01506     if (!m_replay_map_ptr->get(table->id, table_info_ptr)) {
01507       if (!m_live_map_ptr->get(table->id, table_info_ptr))
01508         table_info_ptr = new TableInfo(m_master_client_ptr, table, schema_ptr);
01509       else
01510         table_info_ptr = table_info_ptr->create_shallow_copy();
01511       register_table = true;
01512     }
01513 
01517     if ((error = verify_schema(table_info_ptr, table->generation, errmsg)) != Error::OK)
01518       HT_THROW(error, errmsg);
01519 
01520 
01521     if (register_table)
01522       m_replay_map_ptr->set(table->id, table_info_ptr);
01523 
01527     if (table_info_ptr->get_range(range, range_ptr))
01528       HT_THROW(Error::RANGESERVER_RANGE_ALREADY_LOADED, (String)table->name + "[" + range->start_row + ".." + range->end_row + "]");
01529 
01533     if (!Global::metadata_table_ptr) {
01534       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
01535       Global::metadata_table_ptr = new Table(m_props_ptr, m_conn_manager_ptr, Global::hyperspace_ptr, "METADATA");
01536     }
01537 
01538     schema_ptr = table_info_ptr->get_schema();
01539 
01540     range_ptr = new Range(m_master_client_ptr, table, schema_ptr, range, range_state);
01541 
01542     table_info_ptr->add_range(range_ptr);
01543 
01544     if (Global::range_log)
01545       Global::range_log->log_range_loaded(*table, *range, *range_state);
01546 
01547     if (cb && (error = cb->response_ok()) != Error::OK) {
01548       HT_ERRORF("Problem sending OK response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
01549     }
01550     else {
01551       HT_INFOF("Successfully replay loaded range %s[%s..%s]", table->name, range->start_row, range->end_row);
01552     }
01553 
01554   }
01555   catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
01556     HT_ERRORF("%s '%s'", Error::get_text(error), e.what());
01557     if (cb && (error = cb->error(e.code(), e.what())) != Error::OK) {
01558       HT_ERRORF("Problem sending error response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
01559     }
01560   }
01561 }
01562 
01563 
01564 
01565 void RangeServer::replay_update(ResponseCallback *cb, const uint8_t *data, size_t len) {
01566   TableIdentifier table_identifier;
01567   TableInfoPtr table_info_ptr;
01568   ByteString key, value;
01569   const uint8_t *ptr = data;
01570   const uint8_t *end_ptr = data + len;
01571   const uint8_t *block_end_ptr;
01572   uint32_t block_size;
01573   size_t remaining = len;
01574   const char *row;
01575   String err_msg;
01576   int64_t timestamp;
01577   RangePtr range_ptr;
01578   String end_row;
01579   uint32_t count;
01580   uint64_t memory_added = 0;
01581   uint64_t items_added = 0;
01582   int error;
01583 
01584   if (Global::verbose) {
01585     HT_INFOF("replay_update - length=%ld", len);
01586     cout << flush;
01587   }
01588 
01589   try {
01590 
01591     while (ptr < end_ptr) {
01592 
01593       // decode key/value block size + timestamp
01594       block_size = decode_i32(&ptr, &remaining);
01595       timestamp = decode_i64(&ptr, &remaining);
01596 
01597       if (m_replay_log_ptr) {
01598         DynamicBuffer dbuf(0, false);
01599         dbuf.base = (uint8_t *)ptr;
01600         dbuf.ptr = dbuf.base + remaining;
01601         if ((error = m_replay_log_ptr->write(dbuf, timestamp)) != Error::OK)
01602           HT_THROW(error, "");
01603       }
01604 
01605       // decode table identifier
01606       table_identifier.decode(&ptr, &remaining);
01607 
01608       if (block_size > remaining)
01609         HT_THROWF(Error::MALFORMED_REQUEST, "Block (size=%lu) exceeds EOM",
01610                   (Lu)block_size);
01611 
01612       block_end_ptr = ptr + block_size;
01613 
01614       // Fetch table info
01615       if (!m_replay_map_ptr->get(table_identifier.id, table_info_ptr))
01616         HT_THROWF(Error::RANGESERVER_RANGE_NOT_FOUND, "Unable to find "
01617                   "table info for table name='%s' id=%lu",
01618                   table_identifier.name, (Lu)table_identifier.id);
01619 
01620       while (ptr < block_end_ptr) {
01621 
01622         row = ByteString(ptr).str();
01623 
01624         // Look for containing range, add to stop mods if not found
01625         if (!table_info_ptr->find_containing_range(row, range_ptr))
01626           HT_THROWF(Error::RANGESERVER_RANGE_NOT_FOUND, "Unable to find "
01627                     "range for row '%s'", row);
01628 
01629         end_row = range_ptr->end_row();
01630 
01631         key.ptr = ptr;
01632         while (ptr < block_end_ptr &&
01633                (end_row == "" || (strcmp(row, end_row.c_str()) <= 0))) {
01634 
01635           // extract the key
01636           ptr += key.length();
01637 
01638           if (ptr > end_ptr)
01639             HT_THROW(Error::REQUEST_TRUNCATED, "Problem decoding key");
01640 
01641           value.ptr = ptr;
01642           ptr += value.length();
01643 
01644           if (ptr > end_ptr)
01645             HT_THROW(Error::REQUEST_TRUNCATED, "Problem decoding value");
01646 
01647           HT_EXPECT(range_ptr->replay_add(key, value, timestamp, &count) == Error::OK, Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION);
01648 
01649           if (count) {
01650             items_added += count;
01651             memory_added += count * (ptr - key.ptr);
01652           }
01653 
01654           key.ptr = ptr;
01655           if (ptr < block_end_ptr)
01656             row = key.str();
01657         }
01658       }
01659     }
01660 
01661     Global::memory_tracker.add_memory(memory_added);
01662     Global::memory_tracker.add_items(items_added);
01663 
01664   }
01665   catch (Exception &e) {
01666     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
01667     if (cb) {
01668       cb->error(e.code(), format("%s - %s", e.what(), Error::get_text(e.code())));
01669       return;
01670     }
01671     HT_THROW(e.code(), e.what());
01672   }
01673 
01674   if (cb)
01675     cb->response_ok();
01676 }
01677 
01678 
01679 void RangeServer::replay_commit(ResponseCallback *cb) {
01680   int error;
01681 
01682   if (Global::verbose) {
01683     HT_INFO("replay_commit");
01684     cout << flush;
01685   }
01686 
01687   try {
01688     CommitLog *log = 0;
01689     if (m_replay_group == RangeServerProtocol::GROUP_METADATA_ROOT)
01690       log = Global::root_log;
01691     else if (m_replay_group == RangeServerProtocol::GROUP_METADATA)
01692       log = Global::metadata_log;
01693     else if (m_replay_group == RangeServerProtocol::GROUP_USER)
01694       log = Global::user_log;
01695 
01696     if ((error = log->link_log(m_replay_log_ptr.get(), Global::user_log->get_timestamp())) != Error::OK)
01697       HT_THROW(error, std::string("Problem linking replay log (") + m_replay_log_ptr->get_log_dir() + ") into commit log (" + log->get_log_dir() + ")");
01698 
01699     m_live_map_ptr->merge(m_replay_map_ptr);
01700 
01701   }
01702   catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
01703     HT_ERRORF("%s - %s", e.what(), Error::get_text(e.code()));
01704     if (cb) {
01705       cb->error(e.code(), e.what());
01706       return;
01707     }
01708     HT_THROW(e.code(), e.what());
01709   }
01710 
01711   if (cb)
01712     cb->response_ok();
01713 }
01714 
01715 
01716 
01717 void RangeServer::drop_range(ResponseCallback *cb, TableIdentifier *table, RangeSpec *range) {
01718   TableInfoPtr table_info_ptr;
01719   RangePtr range_ptr;
01720 
01721   if (Global::verbose) {
01722     cout << "drop_range" << endl;
01723     cout << *table;
01724     cout << *range;
01725     cout << flush;
01726   }
01727 
01729   if (!m_live_map_ptr->get(table->id, table_info_ptr)) {
01730     cb->error(Error::RANGESERVER_RANGE_NOT_FOUND, String("No ranges loaded for table '") + table->name + "'");
01731     return;
01732   }
01733 
01735   if (!table_info_ptr->remove_range(range, range_ptr)) {
01736     cb->error(Error::RANGESERVER_RANGE_NOT_FOUND, (String)table->name + "[" + range->start_row + ".." + range->end_row + "]");
01737     return;
01738   }
01739 
01740   cb->response_ok();
01741 }
01742 
01743 void RangeServer::shutdown(ResponseCallback *cb) {
01744   std::vector<TableInfoPtr> table_vec;
01745   std::vector<RangePtr> range_vec;
01746 
01747   (void)cb;
01748 
01749   Global::maintenance_queue->stop();
01750 
01751   // block updates
01752   m_update_mutex_a.lock();
01753   m_update_mutex_b.lock();
01754 
01755   // get the tables
01756   m_live_map_ptr->get_all(table_vec);
01757 
01758   // add all ranges into the range vector
01759   for (size_t i=0; i<table_vec.size(); i++)
01760     table_vec[i]->get_range_vector(range_vec);
01761 
01762   // increment the update counters
01763   for (size_t i=0; i<range_vec.size(); i++)
01764     range_vec[i]->increment_update_counter();
01765 
01766   m_hyperspace_ptr = 0;
01767 
01768   if (Global::range_log)
01769     Global::range_log->close();
01770 
01771   if (Global::root_log)
01772     Global::root_log->close();
01773 
01774   if (Global::metadata_log)
01775     Global::metadata_log->close();
01776 
01777   if (Global::user_log)
01778     Global::user_log->close();
01779 
01780 }
01781 
01782 
01783 
01784 int RangeServer::verify_schema(TableInfoPtr &table_info_ptr, int generation, String &err_msg) {
01785   String tablefile = (String)"/hypertable/tables/" + table_info_ptr->get_name();
01786   DynamicBuffer valbuf;
01787   HandleCallbackPtr null_handle_callback;
01788   int error;
01789   uint64_t handle;
01790   SchemaPtr schema_ptr = table_info_ptr->get_schema();
01791 
01792   if (schema_ptr.get() == 0 || schema_ptr->get_generation() < generation) {
01793 
01794     if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->open(tablefile.c_str(), OPEN_FLAG_READ, null_handle_callback, &handle)) != Error::OK) {
01795       HT_ERRORF("Unable to open Hyperspace file '%s' (%s)", tablefile.c_str(), Error::get_text(error));
01796       exit(1);
01797     }
01798 
01799     if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_get(handle, "schema", valbuf)) != Error::OK) {
01800       err_msg = (String)"Problem getting 'schema' attribute for '" + tablefile + "'";
01801       return error;
01802     }
01803 
01804     m_hyperspace_ptr->close(handle);
01805 
01806     schema_ptr = Schema::new_instance((const char *)valbuf.base, valbuf.fill(), true);
01807     if (!schema_ptr->is_valid()) {
01808       err_msg = (String)"Schema Parse Error for table '" + table_info_ptr->get_name() + "' : " + schema_ptr->get_error_string();
01809       return Error::RANGESERVER_SCHEMA_PARSE_ERROR;
01810     }
01811 
01812     table_info_ptr->update_schema(schema_ptr);
01813 
01814     // Generation check ...
01815     if (schema_ptr->get_generation() < generation) {
01816       err_msg = (String)"Fetched Schema generation for table '" + table_info_ptr->get_name() + "' is " + schema_ptr->get_generation() + " but supplied is " + generation;
01817       return Error::RANGESERVER_GENERATION_MISMATCH;
01818     }
01819   }
01820 
01821   return Error::OK;
01822 }
01823 
01824 
01825 
01826 void RangeServer::do_maintenance() {
01827   struct timeval tval;
01828 
01832   Global::scanner_map.purge_expired(m_scanner_ttl);
01833 
01837   gettimeofday(&tval, 0);
01838   if ((tval.tv_sec - m_last_commit_log_clean) >= (int)(m_timer_interval*4)/5) {
01839     // schedule log cleanup
01840     Global::maintenance_queue->add(new MaintenanceTaskLogCleanup(this));
01841     m_last_commit_log_clean = tval.tv_sec;
01842   }
01843 }
01844 
01845 namespace {
01846 
01847   struct LtPriorityData {
01848     bool operator()(const AccessGroup::CompactionPriorityData &pd1, const AccessGroup::CompactionPriorityData &pd2) const {
01849       return pd1.log_space_pinned >= pd2.log_space_pinned;
01850     }
01851   };
01852 
01853 
01854 }
01855 
01856 
01860 void RangeServer::log_cleanup() {
01861   std::vector<TableInfoPtr> table_vec;
01862   std::vector<RangePtr> range_vec;
01863   uint64_t prune_threshold;
01864   size_t first_user_table = 0;
01865 
01866   if (!m_replay_finished)
01867     wait_for_recovery_finish();
01868 
01869   m_live_map_ptr->get_all(table_vec);
01870 
01871   if (table_vec.empty())
01872     return;
01873 
01877   if (table_vec[0]->get_id() == 0 && Global::metadata_log) {
01878     first_user_table = 1;
01879     table_vec[0]->get_range_vector(range_vec);
01880     // skip root
01881     if (!range_vec.empty() && range_vec[0]->end_row() == Key::END_ROOT_ROW)
01882       range_vec.erase(range_vec.begin());
01883     schedule_log_cleanup_compactions(range_vec, Global::metadata_log, m_log_roll_limit);
01884   }
01885 
01886   range_vec.clear();
01887   for (size_t i=first_user_table; i<table_vec.size(); i++)
01888     table_vec[i]->get_range_vector(range_vec);
01889 
01890   // compute prune threshold
01891   prune_threshold = (uint64_t)((((double)m_bytes_loaded / (double)m_timer_interval) / 1000000.0) * (double)Global::log_prune_threshold_max);
01892   if (prune_threshold < Global::log_prune_threshold_min)
01893     prune_threshold = Global::log_prune_threshold_min;
01894   else if (prune_threshold > Global::log_prune_threshold_max)
01895     prune_threshold = Global::log_prune_threshold_max;
01896 
01897   HT_INFOF("Cleaning log (threshold=%lld)", prune_threshold);
01898   cout << flush;
01899 
01900   schedule_log_cleanup_compactions(range_vec, Global::user_log, m_log_roll_limit);
01901 
01902   m_bytes_loaded = 0;
01903 }
01904 
01905 
01906 void RangeServer::schedule_log_cleanup_compactions(std::vector<RangePtr> &range_vec, CommitLog *log, uint64_t prune_threshold) {
01907   std::vector<AccessGroup::CompactionPriorityData> priority_data_vec;
01908   LogFragmentPriorityMap log_frag_map;
01909   int64_t timestamp, oldest_cached_timestamp = 0;
01910 
01911   range_vec.clear();
01912 
01913   // Load up a vector of compaction priority data
01914   for (size_t i=0; i<range_vec.size(); i++) {
01915     size_t start = priority_data_vec.size();
01916     range_vec[i]->get_compaction_priority_data(priority_data_vec);
01917     for (size_t j=start; j<priority_data_vec.size(); j++) {
01918       priority_data_vec[j].user_data = (void *)i;
01919       if ((timestamp = priority_data_vec[j].ag->get_oldest_cached_timestamp()) != 0) {
01920         if (oldest_cached_timestamp == 0 || timestamp < oldest_cached_timestamp)
01921           oldest_cached_timestamp = timestamp;
01922       }
01923     }
01924   }
01925 
01926   log->load_fragment_priority_map(log_frag_map);
01927 
01932   for (size_t i=0; i<priority_data_vec.size(); i++) {
01933 
01934     if (priority_data_vec[i].oldest_cached_timestamp == 0)
01935       continue;
01936 
01937     LogFragmentPriorityMap::iterator map_iter = log_frag_map.lower_bound(priority_data_vec[i].oldest_cached_timestamp);
01938 
01939     // this should never happen
01940     if (map_iter == log_frag_map.end())
01941       continue;
01942 
01943     if ((*map_iter).second.cumulative_size > prune_threshold) {
01944       if (priority_data_vec[i].mem_used > 0)
01945         priority_data_vec[i].ag->set_compaction_bit();
01946       size_t rangei = (size_t)priority_data_vec[i].user_data;
01947       if (!range_vec[rangei]->test_and_set_maintenance()) {
01948         Global::maintenance_queue->add(new MaintenanceTaskCompaction(range_vec[rangei], false));
01949       }
01950     }
01951   }
01952 
01953   // Purge the commit log
01954   if (oldest_cached_timestamp != 0)
01955     log->purge(oldest_cached_timestamp);
01956 
01957 }
01958 
01959 
01960 
01963 uint64_t RangeServer::get_timer_interval() {
01964   return m_timer_interval*1000;
01965 }
01966 
01967 
01968 void RangeServer::wait_for_recovery_finish() {
01969   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
01970   while (!m_replay_finished) {
01971     HT_INFO_OUT << "Waiting for recovery to complete..." << HT_END;
01972     m_replay_finished_cond.wait(lock);
01973   }
01974 }
01975 
01976 
01977 void RangeServer::wait_for_recovery_finish(TableIdentifier *table, RangeSpec *range) {
01978   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
01979   if (table->id == 0) {
01980     if (!strcmp(range->end_row, Key::END_ROOT_ROW)) {
01981       while (!m_root_replay_finished) {
01982         HT_INFO_OUT << "Waiting for ROOT recovery to complete..." << HT_END;
01983         m_root_replay_finished_cond.wait(lock);
01984       }
01985     }
01986     else {
01987       while (!m_metadata_replay_finished) {
01988         HT_INFO_OUT << "Waiting for METADATA recovery to complete..." << HT_END;
01989         m_metadata_replay_finished_cond.wait(lock);
01990       }
01991     }
01992   }
01993   else {
01994     while (!m_replay_finished) {
01995       HT_INFO_OUT << "Waiting for recovery to complete..." << HT_END;
01996       m_replay_finished_cond.wait(lock);
01997     }
01998   }
01999 }
